item.title: Stitch and create short-form video from our jobs (construction) - Upwork
item.description:
We're looking for a video editor to help us create short-form video for our Instagram.

Frequency: 1-2 videos per week
Duration: 15-20 seconds per video

The video format will be very simple - cut and stitch 1-2 second clips together with cool transitions.

The purpose of the videos is to show our work for each project we're working on in a 15-20 second video.

Please send examples of similar work you have done.

Hourly Range: $11.00-$15.00
Posted On: June 22, 2024 00:51 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Instagram Reels, Instagram Story, Video Editing, Video Production
Skills: Instagram Reels, Instagram Story, Video Editing, Video Production

item.title: Content Creator for Travel App – Highly Curated Stories Format (Video and Pictures) - Upwork
item.description:
Are you passionate about travel and storytelling? Do you have a knack for creating visually stunning and motivational content? We're looking for a talented content creator to join our team and help us inspire solo travelers around the world!

About Us:

Going Solo is a social media traveling app designed to help users find friends to travel with. Our mission is to make solo travel easier, safer, and more enjoyable by connecting like-minded travelers. To achieve this, we need captivating and high-quality content that showcases travel tips, itineraries, and the beauty of various destinations.

Job Responsibilitie

- Create highly curated stories format content (both video and pictures) that is motivational and inspirational.
- Develop travel tips and detailed itineraries for various countries and destinations around the world.
- Source images and videos from the internet and edit them to fit the stories format.
- Ensure all content is pristine, visually appealing, and engaging.
- Work closely with our team to align content with our brand and mission.

Requirements:

- Proven experience in creating high-quality stories format content.
- Strong skills in video editing and photo editing.
- Excellent eye for detail and aesthetics.
- Ability to source and curate content from various online sources.
- Creative mindset with a passion for travel and storytelling.
- Strong communication and collaboration skills.

Preferred Qualifications:

- Experience in travel content creation.
- Familiarity with social media platforms and trends.
- Knowledge of different travel destinations and cultures.

Code: 83198388137317


Posted On: June 22, 2024 00:39 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Instagram Story, Instagram Reels, Travel Video, User Stories, Instagram, Instagram Marketing, UGC, Influencer Marketing
Skills: Instagram Story, Instagram Reels, Travel Video, User Stories, Instagram, Instagram Marketing, UGC, Influencer Marketing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Graphic Design & Video Editing Personal Assistant - Upwork
item.description:
Job Overview:
I am seeking a highly creative and skilled Graphic Design and Video Editing Personal Assistant to join our team on a freelance basis via Upwork. The ideal candidate is proficient in both graphic design and video editing, capable of bringing innovative ideas to life while efficiently managing multiple projects.

This role requires a combination of artistic talent, technical expertise, and excellent communication skills.

Key Responsibilities:

- Design and create engaging graphics for various digital platforms, including social media, websites, and email campaigns.
- Edit and produce high-quality video content that aligns with the brand's messaging and audience's interests.
- Collaborate closely with the team to understand project requirements, concepts, and deadlines.
- Provide creative input and suggestions to enhance visual content.
- Manage and prioritize multiple projects simultaneously to ensure timely delivery.
- Ensure all graphics and videos meet the required specifications and quality standards.

This comes down to lightening my workload, so anyone who is tech-savvy and able to just "figure it out" is perfect.

Hourly Range: $20.00-$30.00
Posted On: June 22, 2024 00:27 UTC
Category: General Virtual Assistance
Skills:Graphic Design, Adobe Photoshop, Video Editing, Adobe Illustrator, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects
Skills: Graphic Design, Adobe Photoshop, Video Editing, Adobe Illustrator, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Hormozi Style*Dream Job do what you love while learning and helping business owners, *consistent - Upwork
item.description:
Listen Closely We Are Looking For People For Our Content Automation Company. People we can have on our team who will be able to edit at least 3-7 short-form videos a day will be paid $6 a video and we will train you to edit to our standards
(NO CAP CUT USERS)

Here is that task, we have a specific standard for how we want our videos and we will show you more about that but here are our values first
Ace Credit Club's Values are

-Speed( we need 1min videos done in less than 2 hours) if not you will not stay on the team long

-Quality( we need you to edit in the exact style we want, while also looking over the captions 3 times before sending the file to save us time. We also want the least revisions needed! That means when we send you our requirements sheet you need to study it to have the least revisions, The only revisions that are justified are captions because we give you all you need for everything else)

-Communication( you need to let us know about problems and also send screenshots of captions that you are unsure of so that we can easily fix it without the wasted time of rendering)



Look at our files if you don't confidently think you can provide this then don't apply! God bless you all

(What Good Looks Like)/ (Our Quality Standard)
https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/12xfEBnoh5GHUWbhrpA3GjMdPosqXenvi?usp=share_link“


Budget: $500
Posted On: June 22, 2024 00:25 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:English
Skills: English
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Photo and Reels Editor for Fashion Brand’s Instagram - Upwork
item.description:
We are a fast-growing fashion brand looking for a talented Photo and Video Editor to join our team. As a Photo and Video Editor, you will be responsible for editing and retouching product photos and videos to meet our brand standards. You will collaborate closely with our creative team to ensure that our visuals are visually appealing and on-brand. The ideal candidate should have a strong portfolio showcasing their expertise in photo and video editing, as well as a good understanding of fashion trends and aesthetics.

    Skills required:
    - Proficiency in Adobe Photoshop and Adobe Premiere Pro
    - Strong eye for detail and the ability to maintain consistent visual style
    - Knowledge of color correction and retouching techniques
    - Understanding of fashion photography and digital media trends

    This is a medium-sized project that will require a commitment of 3 to 6 months. We are looking for an intermediate-level editor who can work efficiently and deliver high-quality edits within deadlines. If you are passionate about fashion, have a keen eye for aesthetics, and can bring our brand vision to life through your editing skills, we would love to hear from you.

Hourly Range: $6.00-$15.00
Posted On: June 22, 2024 00:13 UTC
Category: Logo Design
Skills:Photo Editing, Adobe Photoshop, Fashion & Beauty, Graphic Design, Video Editing
Skills: Photo Editing, Adobe Photoshop, Fashion & Beauty, Graphic Design, Video Editing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Video editing reels for social media - Upwork
item.description:
This is what i am after for my video editing

My social media management company has 2 levels of content

Package 1
8 reels
8 images

Package 2-4
16 reels
16 images

The images there will be 2 versions a square format for Instagram posts and a rectangle format for story uploads

The posts i want them to be edited in a way where we remove the background of that specific product or item and put either a plain black or plain white background or something nice to match the theme of the business

Half the reels in both packages i want edited with captions , an example would be like this link: https://www.instagram.com/reel/C8Oo4ApC6bB/?igsh=ZjF5aTdmN3Nhejh1

I understand that video is a motivational video but i service different businesses so that editing might not apply to the content i will be recording but that will be the job of the editor to suit it towards the content.

The content i will send you will consist of various businesses. For example  mouth guard business, chiropractor, dental clinic , gym , restaurant , take away shop and others

My photographer will take all the videos and photos and you will have access to that file to extract whatever content you need from
Them

To make it easier if there is not enough content you can re use the same clip 2 times  as long as there’s spread apart so they don’t seem to similar to each other (the reels)

The images will sometimes need to be extracted from the videos because the photographer will mainly take videos not photos

I will provide the content in raw format and your job will be to edit them and turn them into reels and images

I will be using ASANA and it will be your job to use it as well to track your tasks for each project

When you complete the work for each project they must be separated in the file link that you send over by week there will be more detail on this if you would like the position

I will pay either by project or by month depending on the situation

My budget for this position will be $50USD if you can not do this budget please do not apply for the position

I have provided all the information if it suits your requirements please respond back and we can begin

I am after 5 people in total because the position will become very busy over time.

If you are interested please contact me via Instagram on slicecentral.syd

Budget: $50
Posted On: June 21, 2024 23:55 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Videography, Video Production
Skills: Video Editing, Videography, Video Production
Country: Australia
click to apply

item.title: Looking for Engaging Spokesperson/ UGC to Present YouTube Videos! - Upwork
item.description:
Hello,

I am seeking someone who can read off scripts and present themselves in person.

This person will be in charge of being the spokesperson for various topics related to softwares, applications, services, and programs.

The person would need to have the following:
- Good on camera prescence
- English accent
- Good camera
- Teleprompter
- Good lighting

This person will be filming themselves reading off a script.

Compensation will be $12 per script read. Scripts will range from 8-20 minutes long.

These videos will be posted onto YouTube and we will be using stillshots of you to create thumbnails as well.

Budget: $400
Posted On: June 21, 2024 23:46 UTC
Category: Voice Talent
Skills:Voice-Over Recording, Male, Female, Spokesperson Video, Content Creation
Skills: Voice-Over Recording, Male, Female, Spokesperson Video, Content Creation

item.title: Video Editor for Short YouTube and TikTok Videos - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a skilled video editor who can create engaging and visually appealing short videos for our YouTube and TikTok channels. The videos will be 60 seconds or less in duration and should captivate our target audience. As a video editor, you will be responsible for selecting the best footage, trimming and rearranging clips, adding transitions, graphics, and effects, and ensuring smooth audio and video synchronization. The ideal candidate has a strong eye for detail, a creative mindset, and experience in editing short-form content. If you are passionate about creating viral videos and have a proven track record in video editing, we would love to work with you.

Skills required:
- Proficient in video editing software (e.g., CapCut, Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro)
- Experience in editing short videos for social media platforms
- Strong understanding of video composition and storytelling
- Knowledge of audio and video synchronization
- Attention to detail
- Creativity in visual and sound effects


Posted On: June 21, 2024 23:27 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Storytelling
Skills: Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Storytelling
Country: United States
click to apply
